ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 71
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ahhhhhhh, well anyway my level 7 Ranger is loads happy to have a banded tunic, gorget, and boots from her older sibling the barbarian warrior - Patricia
ygData.messageBody:
>Message: 7 Date: Mon, 14 Jun 1999 14:55:48 -0400
>From: "Whitmore, Lance" <lwhitmore@...>
>Subject: Re: Looking for item
>My point exactally.. whats the point of playing the game with what >you
>have muled over from another character.. hehe Does it make the >game
>progress any faster.. NO. Just play the game as its meant, if >you do it
>any other way...why its just a glorified irc chat room. >You still cant
>fight anything beyond your level, you just stand out >someone whos trying
>to bypass the system, and most people will look >down on you as someone who
>cant handle the game. Nothing personal i >just put all twinkies in the
>same catogery. The game is just not >that hard, but as in real life
>everyone is looking for a
>handout. Later... Smile... :)

Ahhhhhhh, well anyway my level 7 Ranger is loads happy to have a banded
tunic, gorget, and boots from her older sibling the barbarian warrior -
Patricia Halas!

C'est le vie

Patty Treehugger
Ranger in training of the 7th Rank
Bristlebane Server
